markdownRemark.html:
Support opportunities

  • Pair sessions
  • Workshops
  • Webinars
  • Consulting sessions
  • Tutorials
  • Employee onboarding
  • Office hours
  • Chat tools
  • Issue trackers
  • Forums

Take the time to present all support and training information; it helps give users confidence you have their backs when they get stuck.

frontmatter.title: Support
frontmatter.description: The support page provides information about getting help with using the design system
